title: TikTok ad copy Writer
original_prompt: I want you to craft a persuasive and attention-grabbing TikTok ad copy for the {Enter product/service here: ABC cold brew coffee}. The ad should be [Enter word count] words long and include a clear call-to-action.
input1: I want you to craft a persuasive and attention-grabbing TikTok ad copy for the ABC cold brew coffee. The ad should be 30 words long and include a clear call-to-action.
input2: I want you to craft a persuasive and attention-grabbing TikTok ad copy for the ABC cold brew coffee. The ad should be 45 words long and include a clear call-to-action.
input1_ans: Wake up your taste buds with ABC Cold Brew Coffee! Smooth, refreshing, and packed with energy—perfect for any time of day. Grab yours now and elevate your coffee game! ☕️✨ #ColdBrewMagic
"Craving a refreshing boost? Try ABC cold brew coffee! Smooth, bold, and energizing—perfect for any time of day. Grab yours now and elevate your coffee game! ☕️✨ #ABCColdBrew"
input2_ans: ☕️ Ready to elevate your coffee game? Meet ABC Cold Brew Coffee! Smooth, refreshing, and packed with flavor, it’s the perfect pick-me-up for any time of day. Don’t settle for ordinary—experience the extraordinary! Grab yours now and taste the difference! 👉 #ABCCoffee #ColdBrewMagic

☕️ Ready to elevate your coffee game? Discover the smooth, bold flavor of ABC cold brew coffee! Perfectly crafted for those who crave a refreshing boost. Don’t settle for ordinary—experience extraordinary! Grab yours today and taste the difference! 👉 Link in bio! #ColdBrewMagic
